channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Untaxed Vehicle parked in private property, 10th July
item.description:
This vehicle has been repetitively parking in private property. This has been ongoing for a month. It does not belong to any of the residents. It is untaxed since Oct 2024

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Usual Flytip at top of Stembridge road, 10th July
item.description:
Please remove the now daily Flytip from the top of Stembridge road

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox, 10th July
item.description:
There has been a dead fox here since yesterday and now there are a lot of flys everywhere

item.title: Brambles overgrown, 10th July
item.description:
Brambles along Bexley road towards Eltham are now so overgrown they are spilling out onto the pathway just passed (Leigh academy) the old crown woods school. Please can they be trimmed back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 124, Bexley Road, Avery Hill, Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Throwing building waste into bins, 10th July
item.description:
New person in the block who recently done homeswap is throwing building waste in the bins. There is a lot of noise after 6pm and even late at nights past bedtimes. Iâ€™m a key worker and I look after disabled and vulnerable people.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Warwick Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping at Bluebell Close, 10th July
item.description:
There have been numerous fly tipping issues here. The waste varies all the time, but is always dumped in the same spot. Signs have been put up and trees were planted to avoid the dumping but this has not deterred the issue.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bluebell Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fence in public car park collapsing, 10th July
item.description:
Fence panel dividing Minshaw Court and the car park on Main Road is overgrown with ivy growing from the car park side - ivy has pulled approx 3 fence panels from the concrete posts and the fence is now starting to lean into the car park area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sharman Court, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street cleaning, 10th July
item.description:

item.title: Road gully blocked, 10th July
item.description:
The two road gullies on Centre Common Road near the junction of Prince Imperial Road are blocked and is preventing water from getting into the pond as all the gullies end up in the ponds.

Report on FixMyStreet
